featureDesc: You can use Sorcery to bind Arcane Energy into a mundane weapon and temporarily cause it to become an item of Arcane Power.

featureDesc: You have learned to wield Arcane Energy as a destructive force.

featureNote: You may not take this Feature if you have already taken the Feature Invocation.

featureDesc: You may use Sorcery to Bind and Use Arcane Powers of Primal Darkness.
featureBenDesc: As a standard action, by decreasing your Charge Count by 1, you may diminish or remove light from an area with a radius of up to 5' centered on a point that you can see within 30' of yourself. As a free action once per round, you may increase or decrease the level of darkenss within the affected area from dim to complete darkness. As part of this Power, you are able to see within the affected area as though the effect were not present. Initially, the effect lasts for a number of rounds equal to your Use Magic Check roll result, but may be Expanded as a Free Action beyond the initial limit by spending an additional Charge for a further number of rounds equal to a new Use Magic Check roll result. Also, while you and an opponent are both within the Primal Darkness, you may spend an additional charge in order to lower the targeted opponent's Ticker Value by 1d4. You may do this once per round as a Partial Action for as long as your Primal Darkness remains active. Targeted individuals are allowed a Spiritual Defense Check roll against your Use Magic check in order to negate this loss.
featureNote: The effects of this Power will counter the effects from Primal Light and negate the effects of both.

featureDesc: You can use the Arcane Power of Primal Darkness to shroud and protect you.
featureBenDesc: As a Full Round Action, by decreasing your Charge Count by 1d4+1, you may manifest an Arcane Presence of Darkness. This Presence rises up around you to dim the level of all light within your Reach. While near you, others feel a little unsure. The effect lasts for a number of rounds equal to your Use Magic Check roll result + the Charge cost. Before Cloaked in Darkness ends, you may continue the effect as a Free Action by spending 1 additional Charge and making a new Use Magic Check roll to establish how many rounds the effect will continue. This Power provides you with 10% Concealment against all Ranged and Melee attacks. Creatures who you touch, who touch you without your consent, or who succeed at a Melee Combat Check against you will suffer 1d6 points of loss from Ticker Value for each instance of contact. Additionally, while Cloaked in Darkness, you automatically manifest the Feature Primal Darkness without having to decrease your current Charge.
featureNote: You may only have one Arcane Presence active at a time. This effect will remain until dismissed or until you lose consciousness.

featureDesc: You can use the Arcane Power of Primal Darkness to attack your foes.

The ability lasts as long as your current Cloaked in Darkness effect. Darkbolt must be re-manifested with 1 additional Charge each time your Cloak is renewed. The Darkbolt deals +1d6 points of Ticker Value loss on a successful Ranged Magic Attack Check roll.
